participant_1.background:
I'm going to be spending this weekend working on my juicing bar business and trying to figure out how to advertise it to my neighbors.
i am looking for krav maga classes near my home.
i live with my parents.
My dog is my best friend, so I'd love to have lunch with him and learn some new tricks to teach him.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

participant_2.background:
I used to play with my toy cars a lot when I was younger, but now I don't have as much time for them.
My job is secure and I get paid well.
i am allergic to apples yet still eat them.
i run marathons.
ariel is my favorite princess.

content.text: I'm doing well, thanks for asking! How are you?
I'm doing good as well. I'm excited to start my juicing bar business this weekend!
That's awesome! What kind of juices do you plan on serving?
I'm thinking of starting with a few basic juices like an apple juice, a green juice, and a beet juice.
Those sound delicious! I love beet juice.
Me too! I'm excited to start experimenting with different flavors and ingredients.
I'm sure you'll do great! I'm also allergic to apples, but I still eat them sometimes.
Oh, really? I've never met anyone who is allergic to apples before.
Yeah, it's not very common. But it doesn't stop me from enjoying them!
That's good to hear! I'm glad you're not letting your allergy stop you from enjoying the things you love.
Thanks! I'm also a big fan of Ariel, she's my favorite princess.
Mine too! She's so beautiful and kind.
I know, right? She's the perfect princess.
I'm glad we have something in common!
